categories: Category:Military officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Jorthal was a male Human corporal who lived on the war-torn world of Balmorra. He made a living as a vendor by selling light armor to the reconstituted Sith Empire's citizens.

Jorthal appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Light Armor Vendor for Imperial players on Balmorra. With the release of Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015, he was removed from the game along with the rest of the Light Armor Vendors.[source?]
